Package com.rockhoppertech.music

These are the "core" or essential music classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Timed  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Duration
    Handy constants for durations along with methods for calculating durations.
    DurationParser  
    Interval
    Utilities to convert between scale or chord spellings, intervals, degrees.
    Note
    The Note class is a utility.
    Pattern
    Essentially a holder for the values to create a MIDITrack based on a given set of degrees and a pattern contained in an int array.
    Pattern.Builder
    Bloch's pattern and not the GoF pattern.
    PatternFactory  
    Pitch
    A representation of musical frequency (Pitch).
    Pitch.PitchClassComparator  
    PitchFactory
    Uses the GoF flyweight pattern.
    PitchFormat
    Formats the text representation of a Pitch.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Pitch.P  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidMIDIPitchException
    If specify a pitch < Pitch.MIN or > Pitch.MAX.

Package com.rockhoppertech.music Description

These are the "core" or essential music classes.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gene De Lisa
